ModulePrefs.title: My Gadget

Module.Content:
<html lang="en"><head>
  <meta charset="utf-8">
  <title>GadgetHarness</title>

  <style type="text/css">
    /*noinspection ALL*/
    html {
      width: __UP_rdW__px;
      height: __UP_rdH__px;
    }

    /*noinspection ALL*/
    body,
    app-root {
      background: transparent;
      width: __UP_rdW__px;
      height: __UP_rdH__px;
      overflow: hidden;
    }
  </style>
<link rel="stylesheet" href="styles.ef46db3751d8e999.css"></head>
